attributes.additional_details: Call an early General Election and allow the people of the UK to rectify the current parliamentary makeup. Expell the current government and have a vote of confidence in the Prime Minister and Chancellor. Any election should be taken as a reforendum over the current government's ineptitude.
attributes.background: The people of the UK have lost confidence in the current government over their mismanagement of the covid crisis and their decisions not to help the most vulnerable in Society.
